lead_paragraph: China has been making significant reforms to its legal system, but many people see the past year as a period of retreat, rather than advance, in China’s effort to establish the rule of law.

headline.print_headline: China Grants Courts Greater Autonomy on Limited Matters
headline.main: China Grants Courts Greater Autonomy on Limited Matters

snippet: China has been making significant reforms to its legal system, but many people see the past year as a period of retreat, rather than advance, in China’s effort to establish the rule of law.
abstract: Movement led by Chinese judges to give country's courts greater independence from government finds incremental success; proponents say handful of recent convictions of prominent dissidents are exceptions to overall progress towards truly independent judiciary; series of reforms at provincial level expected to have most impact.
